Wichita.Wichita Collegiate School: Wichita Collegiate School, known locally as Collegiate, is a private, co-educational, non-denominational, and non-profit college preparatory day school founded in 1963 currently enrolling 966 students from preschool through 12th grade located in Wichita, Kansas, United States. The Headmaster is Tom Davis. Wichita Collegiate School has built a statewide reputation for academic excellence.
